688410.name: MINDNIGHT Hack Me Hard DLC - Soundtrack (Bonus Track + Jukebox Skin)
688410.description:
This is the Soundtrack of MINDNIGHT, in "220kbps MP3's" format and also in a high quality .flac format . Over 4 tracks, unlooped, for over 10 minutes of pure synth ear joy composed and scored by Alexandru "Sasha" Sirbu, No Moon's music composer.

Recommended to buy. Maybe don't listen if you are a hacker.
This package also includes a bonus track that is not implemented in the original game.

Track-list:
1. The Hacker (1:44)
2. Rooftops & City Lights (2:08)
3. Cyber Market (03:47)
4. City Drive (Bonus Track) (03:06)

Last but not least we have also included a super awesome surprise future-worthy wallpaper at a 4k resolution with the beautiful sunset of San Francisco.
